The opposition was forcibly removed, leading to a resumed session without their presence.

The decision prioritises children’s health as pollution remains severe, with officials directing strict compliance across government and private schools.

The actors sought merging of FIRs across states. The FIR, filed by Sonipat resident Vipul Antil, alleges they promoted a society accused of defrauding the public.

title: Nvidia responds to DeepSeek report; denies claims of ‘banned’ chips behind Jan market rout
description: Nvidia has denied reports that Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is using smuggled Blackwell GPUs, calling the claims "far-fetched." The US has restricted these advanced chips from export to China to maintain its AI lead. DeepSeek's earlier AI model launch at a lower cost had already raised concerns about China's rapid progress.

title: Where does Auston Matthews live? Inside Leafs star’s homes and lifestyle
description: Auston Matthews' net worth is estimated at $30 million in 2025, driven by his substantial NHL salary and lucrative endorsement deals with major brands like Nike and RBC. Beyond hockey, he has strategically invested in startups and actively supports men's health through philanthropy, showcasing a multi-faceted financial profile.

title: MLB trade rumors: Braves eye $325M Rangers star to boost title odds
description: Atlanta Braves are reportedly exploring a blockbuster trade for Texas Rangers star Corey Seager, a move that could significantly alter the NL playoff landscape. Despite Seager's hefty contract and a no-trade clause, the Braves see him as a crucial solution for their shortstop woes. This potential deal offers Atlanta elite offense and Texas a chance to rebuild their farm system.

title: Blake Lively calls Taylor Swift 'the dreamiest friend' amid Eras Tour buzz
description: Blake Lively celebrated a business venture amid reports of a strained friendship with Taylor Swift. Swift is reportedly "hurt" and feels used due to Lively's legal issues involving her "It Ends with Us" co-star. Lively's social media post focused on her haircare brand collaboration, pointedly avoiding any mention of Swift, highlighting a careful navigation of public perception and personal relationships.
